mapper.select: select count(distinct ci.info_id) from cs_info ci,cs_info_ref cr where cr.ware_id = #{ware_id} and cr.app_id = #{app_id} and cr.site_id = #{site_id} and cr.info_id = ci.info_id
select winfo_id from cs_ware_info where ware_id = #{ware_id} and app_id = #{app_id} and site_id = #{site_id} order by sort_id,winfo_id
select * from cs_ware_infos where winfo_id = #{winfo_id} order by sort_id,id
mapper.update: update cs_ware_info set sort_id = #{sort_id} where winfo_id = #{winfo_id}
mapper.delete: delete from cs_ware_info where ware_id in (${ware_ids}) and app_id = #{app_id} and site_id = #{site_id}
mapper.update: update cs_ware_infos set sort_id = #{sort_id} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from cs_ware_infos where ware_id in (${ware_ids}) and app_id = #{app_id} and site_id = #{site_id}
mapper.select: select top ${page_size} info_id,title,subtitle,title_color,author,thumb_url,content_url,description,input_dtime from cs_info where info_id not in ( select top ${start_num} info_id from cs_info where info_id in ( select ci.info_id from cs_info ci,cs_info_ref cr where cr.ware_id = #{ware_id} and cr.site_id = #{site_id} and cr.info_id = ci.info_id ) ) order by info_id desc
